lead_paragraph: Germany's Koenigssee will host the 2017 world championships after they were taken away from Russia's Sochi following the country's doping scandal, the International Bobsleigh and Skeleton Federation (IBSF) said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: Bobsleigh-Germany's Koenigssee to Host 2017 World Championships
headline.main: Bobsleigh-Germany's Koenigssee to Host 2017 World Championships
